item.title: Full-Color GPU Console Charts
item.description: Intro # My previous post on TensorRT Quantization this post would be an awesome chance to talk about in detail what the NVD metrics are…and also to share the nvd alias, because nvidia-smi by itself is terrible after my last post I got a surprising amount of interest in the realtime GPU console charts I had hacked up for the article, so I decided to polish them a little and make them easier to use
